Package org.apache.fop.accessibility

Interface Summary
AccessibilityEventProducer Event producer for accessibility-related events.
 

Class Summary
Accessibility Helper class for FOP's accessibility features.
AccessibilityEventProducer.Provider Provider class for the event producer.
StructureTree A reduced version of the document's FO tree, containing only its logical structure.
StructureTreeBuilder Helper class that re-builds a structure tree from what is stored in an intermediate XML file (IF XML or AreaÂ Tree XML).
